[ti:If You Leave Me Now]

[00:00.00]If You Leave Me Now(feat. Boyz II Men) - Charlie Puth (查理·普斯)/Boyz II Men (男孩.男儿乐队)
[00:00.90]Lyrics by：Charlie Puth/Robin Wiley/Tobias Jesso Jr.
[00:01.80]Charlie Puth：
[00:02.45]
[00:15.39]No this is not goodbye
[00:19.20]
[00:21.77]I swear that I'm gonna change
[00:25.57]
[00:28.30]No baby please don't cry
[00:32.12]
[00:34.52]It doesn't have to end this way
[00:39.23]
[00:39.78]'Cause when I think of all the nights I'll be alone
[00:44.65]
[00:45.96]I get terrified
[00:48.17]
[00:49.18]Please don't say goodbye
[00:51.52]
[00:52.50]'Cause girl if you leave me now
[00:56.92]
[00:58.55]If you give it up and just walk right out
[01:03.59]
[01:05.54]You will take the biggest part of me
[01:08.84]And all the things that I believe
[01:12.36]Baby if you leave me now yeah
[01:18.75]Boyz II Men：
[01:20.00]When did we lose our way
[01:24.30]

[01:29.80]

[01:37.31]
[01:39.20]There's no road for the travelling
[01:42.66]

[01:44.72]When I think about all of the nights you're gone
[01:48.92]Nights you're gone oh
[01:50.75]I get terrified I get terrified
[01:53.93]Please don't say goodbye
[01:56.80]
[01:57.43]'Cause girl if you leave me now
[02:01.61]

[02:09.73]
[02:10.25]You will take the biggest part of me
[02:13.76]And all the things that I believe
[02:17.23]Baby if you leave me now
[02:22.66]
[02:23.45]Oh baby if you leave me now

[02:31.30]Oh I can promise if we parted parted
[02:36.51]
[02:37.86]And if you left me brokenhearted
[02:41.42]
[02:44.07]Every single night I'll think about you with someone else
[02:49.71]Baby if you leave me
